title: NetworkView
body: I believe that everyone in XAML lovers, we want a robust and complete standard and that facilitates the life of the developer so I propose to include these controls as a standard of XAML specification. These are widely used in the real world today. In several areas we find these types of control such as audio/video playes, visual programming, animation software, single/multitracks audio editors, video editors, slide editors, photo gallery, websites, social networks among many others.
